details.creator: veraPDF Consortium
details.name: ISO 14289-1:2014 - 7.21 Fonts - 7.21.4 Embedding - CIDSet entry in CID Fonts
details.description: If the FontDescriptor dictionary of an embedded CID font contains a CIDSet stream, then it shall identify all CIDs which are present in the font program, regardless of whether a CID in the font is referenced or used by the PDF or not.

rule.description: If the FontDescriptor dictionary of an embedded CID font contains a CIDSet stream, then it shall identify all CIDs which are present in the font program, regardless of whether a CID in the font is referenced or used by the PDF or not.
rule.test: fontFile_size == 0 || fontName.search(/[A-Z]{6}\+/) != 0 || containsCIDSet == false || cidSetListsAllGlyphs == true

error.message: A CIDSet entry in the Font descriptor does not correctly identify all glyphs present in the embedded font subset
